content.question: Which of the following best explains Briand’s view as expressed in the passage?

choices.label: The need for European states to cooperate in suppressing anticolonial rebellions
The desire to cooperate with former enemies to halt the spread of Bolshevism after the Russian Revolution
The desire of French political leaders to punish Germany for its actions in the First World War
The fears of French and other countries’ political leaders of a repeat of the First World War

content.answer: The fears of French and other countries’ political leaders of a repeat of the First World War

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
